name: The NightWatch
description:
Your village is cursed by an invading horde of Mothmen every night. You play as the coordinator of the Night Watch, the village's only defense. You must coordinate lighting and dimming the four signal towers surrounding the village while tossing torches out into the masses to distract the Mothmen long enough for you and the village to survive the night.

WASD or Arrow Keys to light the associated direction's signal flare

Click on the screen to drop a torch. Mothmen will be attracted to sources of light, but beware: if they aren't distracted, they will break down the gates of your village and it'll be GAME OVER!
